Instruction: Cut the cantaloupe into small cubes.
In a large bowl, combine the diced cantaloupe, diced cucumber, sliced red onion, and chopped fresh mint leaves.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice and honey to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish.
